nodes.text: Meglumine was a planet. In 0 ABY, Imperial stormtrooper TK329 was serving on the Imperial Star Destroyer Vector that had a stopover near Meglumine. A small number of the ship's crew went planetside, while the rest enjoyed some recreation time aboard the ship.

Meglumine was mentioned in an entry on Stormtrooper TK 329 (TK329) on Twitter, a Twitter account from the perspective of an in-universe stormtrooper. On the Jedi Council Forums, Jason Fry confirmed that Meglumine was a legitimate canonical planet.
